enWisdom: Contentment is the most lasting honour
Obedience is the prestige of the underprivileged
The honoured is the one who becomes honoured through obedience [to Allah]
He who adorns himself with obedience possesses honour
When you seek glory, then seek it through obedience [to Allah]
The honour of a believer is his faith and his prestige is by his obedience [to Allah]

Wisdom: مَنْ أَطَاعَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ عَزَّ وَقَوِيَ
enWisdom: One who obeys Allah, the Glorified, becomes powerful and strong

Wisdom: مَنْ سَرَّهُ الْغِنَى بِلَا مَالٍ وَالْعِزُّ بِلَا سُلْطَانٍ وَالْكَثْرَةُ بِلَا عَشِيرَةٍ فَلْيَخْرُجْ مِنْ ذُلِّ مَعْصِيَةِ اللَّهِ إِلَى عِزِّ طَاعَتِهِ فَإِنَّهُ وَاجِدُ ذَلِكَ كُلِّهِ
enWisdom: One who would like to gain affluence without possessions, prestige without authority and abundance without kinsfolk, then let him them come out of the abjectness of disobedience to Allah into the honour of His obedience, for indeed [through this] he will find all of these
One whose obedience increases, his honor increases
There is no honour like obedience [to Allah]
There is no glory except through obedience [to Allah]
One who obeys Allah, has sought [His] assistance (or has seen the truth)

Wisdom: مَنْ أَطَاعَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ عَزَّ نَصْرُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever obeys Allah, the Glorified, his support becomes powerful

Wisdom: مَنْ أَطَاعَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ لَمْ يَضُرَّهُ مَنْ أَسْخَطَ مِنَ النَّاسِ
enWisdom: One who obeys Allah, the Glorified, is not harmed by the resentful from among the people
One who submits to Allah remains safe

Wisdom: مَنْ سَالَمَ اللَّهَ سَلَّمَهُ وَمَنْ حَارَبَ اللَّهَ حَرَبَهُ
enWisdom: Whoever surrenders to Allah will be granted security by Him and whoever wages war with Allah will be destroyed by Him
Whoever obeys Allah, his affair becomes lofty
Whoever obeys Allah, his affair becomes elevated
